definitions.title: Pe‘îl
definitions.body: be slain: Pf. 3 ms. [[קְטִיל]] Da 5:30, 3 fs. [[קְטִילַת]] Da 7:11.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: slay: Pf. 3 ms. [[קַטִּל]] Da 3:22 (acc. pers.); Inf. [[לְקַטָּלָה]] Da 2:14 ([[ל]] acc. pers.).

definitions.title: Hithpe.
definitions.body: be slain: Inf. [[לְהִתְקְטָלָה]] Da 2:13; Pt. (= gerundive, K:§ 76, 3) pl. [[מִתְקַטְלִין]] v:Da 2:13 were to be slain.
